Name: Electroboo
Desc: Bzzzt... Please wear insulated gloves when petting.

1.Name: Maximum Voltage!
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Charges the enemy and continuously electrocutes the target, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> and accumulating <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color>.

1.Name: Inductive Current
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are at least 2 <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Attribute</color> characters in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color> inflicts 60% more Anomaly Buildup.
